Package com.eteks.sweethome3d.swing

Implements views created by Sweet Home 3D controllers with Swing components.

See: Description

    Interface Description
    FurnitureTable.FurnitureFilter
    The super type used to specify how furniture should be filtered in furniture table.

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InterruptedPrinterException
    A printer exception thrown when print is interrupted.

Package com.eteks.sweethome3d.swing Description

Implements views created by Sweet Home 3D controllers with Swing components.

All these components are created on demand by the SwingViewFactory class that implements the ViewFactory interface specified in the com.eteks.sweethome3d.viewcontroller package.
